title.narrative: Capacity Building and Regulatory Support Technical Assistance

description.narrative: The proposed Technical Assistance (TA) program is part of the Scaling-up Renewable Energy in Low-income Countries Program Investment Plan (SREP IP) that will support the Government of Mongolia (GoM) in comprehensively addressing the country's renewable energy potential by supporting physical investments and implementing policy actions to create an enabling environment for sustained public and private investments.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
